description: Complete system overview with architecture and key components, focusing on the memory-first design and integration patterns between AI, memory, and communication systems
Detailed documentation of the memory management system, including taxonomy structure, categorization algorithms, and metadata extraction processes
Comprehensive documentation of data models for memories, events, and user data, including relationships, schemas, and data flow between components
Technical documentation of AI integration patterns, context awareness implementation, and data flow between memory system and various services (email, calendar, voice)
Detailed documentation of memory extraction algorithms, document parsing logic, and automated categorization systems with taxonomy rules
